sequence.name: username
sequence.errTemplate: Sorry. I couldn't understand your name. Could you repeat it again?

sequence.name: birthdate
sequence.errTemplate:
Ohh, apologies {{username}}, I don’t understand. 

Can you please specify your birthdate in YYYY-MM-DD format? 

Thanks!

sequence.name: plan
sequence.msgTemplate:
Nice! What insurance plan are you interested in?

A: Basic health insurance.
B: Full health insurance.
C: Full health and dental insurance.

Please answer A, B or C according to your choice.
sequence.errTemplate: Sorry, can you please reply A, B or C depending on what insurance plan you wish to purchase? Thanks.
